Output Modules.​PIT_CONSOLE.​PIT_CONSOLE_PKG Body

Implements PIT_CONSOLE output module methods.

Author

Juergen Sieben, ConDeS GmbH

Published under MIT licence

Package Constants
Parameter Constants
C_PARAM_GROUP

Parameter group of PIT

C_PIT_CONSOLE

Parameter name prefix for PIT_CONSOLE parameters

C_FIRE_THRESHOLD

Parameter name for the fire threshold

C_ENTER_TEMPLATE

Parameter name for the ENTER-Template

C_LEAVE_TEMPLATE

Parameter name for the LEAVE-Template

C_MESSAGE_TEMPLATE

Parameter name for the MESSAGE-Template

C_LEVEL_INDICATOR

Parameter name for the indent level indicator

Helper Methods
initialize
procedure initialize

Initialization, reads several parameters into global variables

print
procedure print(
p_message in clob
)

Helper to print a message to the console. Called to print a message text to the console, reducing output to 32KByte to take limitations of <DBMS_OUTPUT> into account

Parameter
p_message
in clob

Message to print to the console
